about_me.des: I am a Software Developer with experience in developing Java & Web Applications and websites. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It's pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.

career.nextcode_des: Developed Websites for Caterpillarâ€™s Product-to-Customer(P2C) Finance Portal using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript & JQuery, Implemented RESTful Web services in the framework with JQuery and JavaScript as client
career.nextcode_job: Java, Front End Web and Portal Developer
career.netease_des: Designed and implemented BI (Business Intelligence) dashboard which used Ajax, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and JQuery deployed on Amazon EC2 servers. Amazon ESB, and S3 were utilized as the storage space
career.netease_job: Front End Developer and UX/UI Developer
career.ucloud_des: Devised solutions to expedite the procurement of required data for unique website architectures comprised of X/HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, and AJAX
career.college_des: At July 2014, I graduated from NYU and started my IT technology tour.
